entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 04:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this morning then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
